r.s: A Class the facilitates the search of filesystems
r.d: File_Find, created as a replacement for its Perl counterpart, also named File_Find, is a directory searcher, which handles, globbing, recursive directory searching, as well as a slew of other cool features.
r.n:
+ Empty pattern workaround from bug #6173 also in glob method
Various 'enhancements' to 'shell' method http://pear.php.net/manual/en/package.filesystem.file-find.searchmethods.php
* Empty pattern specified in 'shell' is equal to '*.*'
- Empty exclude mask of a 'shell' pattern is detected correctly now
+ Use *. to match files without extension
+ use filename.*. to match files with only one 'extension' (bug #5503)
